# Visiualizing Climate Change Data With ggplot2

  Climate change is here and observing its trends using historical tempeature data paints a daunting image of future where live as we know it is drastically different. To explore these trends through visualization, obtained temperature data and studied it using ggplot2.
  Average mean temperature, minimum temperature and maxiumum temperature   from the National Center for Environmental Information (NCEI) for Richmond, Virgina between 1983-2019 was obtained.
